item.subject: Playing a conversation
item.explaination:
Overview

You can easily start the playback of a conversation if you select first a Topic then a Conversation from the dropdown lists on the right hand side.

After you have made your choice, you have to push the Play button under the dropdown lists.

Playing and stopping a conversation


You can Pause a conversation any time during playback. If you then click the Play button again after a Pause, the conversation will continue from where you left off.

Stopping a conversation will reset the conversation to the starting point.
